summary: Alaska Airlines is a big airline based near Seattle, Washington. It's one of the top six airlines in North America. The airline flies to over 100 places in the U.S., Bahamas, Belize, Canada, and more. It works with other companies like Horizon Air. Many people like Alaska Airlines because of its good customer service. In 2023, they said they wanted to buy Hawaiian Airlines, and in 2024, this plan was approved by the U.S. government.
title: Alaska Airlines
